revised_title: Secular Change in the Magnetic Dip in London: A Historical Analysis
tldr: This article presents a historical analysis of the secular change in the magnetic dip in London between the years 1821 and 1860. The author discusses four determinations at different epochs, focusing on the magnetic observations made in Regent's Park and Kew Observatory. The study aims to understand the changes in the Earth's magnetic field and its implications for navigation and scientific research.
